Enchant creature
You control enchanted creature.
Enchanted creature is a white Mercenary with base power and toughness 1/1.
flavor_text:
[i]“I dunno, Jake. Guess you could say I finally saw the light. History is in the makin', and I'm worried you're on the wrong side of it.”
—Talon, former Sidewinders second-in-command[/i]
